BotPenguin vs engati
Discover the Perfect Engati Alternative: It's BotPenguin!
Our ChatGPT-powered AI chatbot offers all that the Engati chatbot can’t. Be it WhatsApp Commerce, 60+ native Integration, Facebook bot or landing page chatbot.
Detailed head-to-head
FREE Forever plan. No Credit Card Required.
Why do users choose BotPenguin as an Engati Alternative?
Engage and Convert Leads into Customers with Ease. Combine our eCommerce bot and ChatGPT through native integration and witness marketing automation fulfilling your conversion targets.
Extra Features at Reduced Cost
BotPenguin’s professional plan comes at $5 per month. Engati’s lowest pricing starts at $5 a day.
Enjoy Unlimited Chatbots
Enjoy unlimited chatbots for your account with BotPenguin. Engati offers 3-50 chatbots and unlimited only in the enterprise edition.
Explore Multiple Platforms
Both Chatbots provide multi-platform integration, covering websites, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, and landing pages. Engati Chatbot for WhatsApp and landing pages is only available in the enterprise plan.
Voice-Support
Both AI Chatbots provide voice support for bot users, simplifying customer interactions.
Which One is the better chatbot alternative?
BotPenguin is gully stacked with features that engati can’t offer making it the perfect engati alternative.

Why you need an Engati alternative today!
Few Native Integrations: Engati only integrates with a few third-party applications, a drawback for businesses working on multiple apps.
Facebook Comment Automation: Engagti does have a Facebook chatbot. However, it lacks the time-saving feature of auto-reply.
No Landing Page Bot: Engati doesn’t have a landing page chatbot. It is quite a crucial feature for businesses that don’t have a website.
Lacks eCommerce Integrations: Engati lacks direct integration with Shopify and WooCommerce, the leading platforms.
Custom Templates: Although Engati provides chatbot templates. You can’t add custom templates tailored to your specific use case.
Pricing: Lastly, $150 per month is steep for small businesses. Engati alternatives like BotPenguin charge $5 monthly.
Try BotPenguin
Choose BotPenguin as one of the most effective engati alternatives
As an Engati alternative, BotPenguin offers clear pricing, a free forever plan, ChatGPT integration, landing page bot, Whatsapp commerce, and more.
60+ native integrations, including Hubspot, GoHighLevel, Google Calendar, and more.
Start drip & broadcast campaigns on Facebook & Telegram. Also, let the Facebook bot auto-reply to comments.
Get the omnichannel Live Chat from the base plan. No daily fees or extra charges are required.
Try 40+ templates for various business use cases, or upload a custom template for your niche.
Get a free forever plan with website & social bots, 2000 messages/monthly, and unlimited contacts.
Get Started FREE

Frequently Asked Questions
How does Engati work?
Engati is an AI-powered chatbot platform that uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) and machine learning algorithms to understand user queries and provide relevant responses. It offers an easy-to-use interface for building and deploying chatbots across multiple channels.
Is there a free Engati alternative?
Yes, BotPenguin is a free Engati alternative that offers a forever free plan with 2000 monthly messages. It provides essential AI chatbot functionality, 60+ native integration options, GPT model integration, and templates to get started.
Who are the competitors of Engati?
Some competitors of Engati in the chatbot platform space include BotPenguin, Chatfuel, ManyChat, and Botsify.
What is a business-oriented Engati alternative?
BotPenguin is a business-oriented Engati alternative that offers features like WhatsApp Commerce, 60+ native integrations, Facebook bots for auto-replying to comments, and a landing page chatbot. It focuses on helping businesses engage and convert leads into customers with ease.
Which alternative is suitable for chatbot functionality, similar to Engati?
BotPenguin is a suitable Engati alternative for chatbot functionality. It offers multi-platform integration, no-code chatbot builder, voice support, and analytics. However, it also provides additional features like WhatsApp automation, customizable reports, and more.
